attributes.action: We demand a full and open public inquiry into the Pakistani child rape gangs.
attributes.background: Every person be they police,social workers or politicians who covered up these crimes and allowed the rapists to continue their atrocities must be exposed and prosecuted.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
